subject: Re: [cc-community] Creative License Conference
body:
Evan Prodromou wrote:
> So, am I the only person who had to read the description of this
> conference a couple of times before they realized it has nothing to do
> with Creative Commons licenses?

Heh, I particularly like the slogan at the bottom:

"Creative License: Take as much as you want"

That's like the antithesis of Creative Commons, isn't it? :-)

Cheers,
Terry

-- 
Terry Hancock (hancock@AnansiSpaceworks.com)
Anansi Spaceworks http://www.AnansiSpaceworks.com
